aws_cognito_identity_pool_roles_attachme.description: Provides an AWS Cognito Identity Pool Roles Attachment.

identity_pool_id.description: - An identity pool ID in the format REGION:GUID.

roles.description: - The map of roles associated with this pool. For a given role, the key will be either "authenticated" or "unauthenticated" and the value will be the Role ARN.

identity_pool_id.description: An identity pool ID in the format REGION:GUID.

roles.description: The map of roles associated with this pool. For a given role, the key will be either "authenticated" or "unauthenticated" and the value will be the Role ARN.
